comment.author: 22502234@N00
comment._content: very interesting photo, unfortunately, this is NOT an example of a Zeppelin. Since this was taken during wartime (5/1942) , it is highly unlikely that it was manufactured by the Zeppelin company in Germany. Further, the term Zeppelin, as used generically for airships, refers only to rigid airships or dirigibles. i recommend the removal of the "Zeppelin" tag for historical accuracy.
